attributes.action: make it law that Dan Lester must be invited to any and all weddings taking place within the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No wedding can be complete with Dan Lester. But many go ahead regardless. This should, and indeed has to, change. I myself am sick of attending weddings with no Dan Lester. (But there's no way I'm taking him as my plus one.)

Thankyou

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
